In Ed Harris

…as astronaut John Glenn in The Right Stuff (1983), the story of the Mercury space program based on Tom Wolfe’s book of the same name. In 1986 Harris made his Broadway debut in a production of George Furth’s Precious Sons and was nominated for a Tony Award.
